attributes.action: make all traffic lights operate during rush hours only ('give way' at other times of the day)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The argument in favour of traffic lights is put forward using rush hour data, so outside the rush hour there is no need for them.  In most cases drivers are more than capable of treating such junctions as a give way, instead of waiting needlessly for 1-2 minutes.  For example, traffic lights on roundabouts, on motorway slip roads, at T junctions.
